lines.text: If Slick was a <c=#FF6000>Go Wizard!</c> He could've intended to cast <c=#FF6000>Emergency Exit,</c> and then poof away!
Have we not been over this? Slick ain't a wizard.
He's never used magic in any of his jobs, and he's on record committin' hate crimes against sympathizers.
Huh? The hate crimes thing is new to me.
Anyway, it could be a recent thing- maybe he had a change of heart!
Maybe, but... well, from what's left of his face, we can be pretty sure he doesn't have those tattoos.
Maybe... the fire... made the ink evaporate?
Let's move on to somethin' plausible, kid.
